text: Salomon Arvid Achates Lindman, born 19 September 1862, dead 9 December 1936, was a Swedish rear admiral, industrialist and conservative politician. He served as the Prime Minister of Sweden from 1906 to 1911, and then again from 1928 to 1930. ==References== Category:1862 births Category:1936 deaths Category:Admirals Category:Swedish businesspeople Category:Government ministers of Sweden Category:People from Uppsala Category:Prime ministers of Sweden Category:Swedish military people
title: Arvid Lindman
